description.value: You have a nearly encyclopedic knowledge of all creatures of the world. You can use Nature to @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Recall Knowledge]{Recall Knowledge} to identify any creature. In addition, you gain the benefits of @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Monster Hunter]{Monster Hunter} (and @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Monster Warden]{Monster Warden}, if you have it) on a success as well as a critical success.
